attributes.action: Fully fund a British National Space Program
attributes.additional_details: An annual budget of around £5 billion would make the United Kingdom a leader in space and science!
attributes.background: The world is heading to space, and nearly every other world power is already there, the U.K. should fund its own Space Programme, there are many advantages to this such as economic growth and national security infrastructure such as GPS. The U.K. will lose access to Galileo, reason to fund UKSA.
